comments.body: There are multiple sources in both `bld.bat` and `build.sh` I have confess that I am confused. Can you clarify what is being install and why? Can we factor out any of those as another package?

Beakerx is a main dependency of this package. That being said all dependencies are managed by Maven. The thing is for now the Beakerx package is missing a Maven artifact I could use.

So I would like to merge it like this to start with. So people can start using the kernel and give me feedback on it.

Then once the Beakerx project release Maven artifacts (probably in few weeks), I will modify this recipe to remove the manual Beakerx installation.

Hope you understand.

> Hope you understand.

If you add some comments in the recipe mentioning that and open an issue in the feedstock to track that I don't see any major blocks. But we need to document this decision to avoid getting lost in the process.
Ok I'll add a comment and open an issue once the feedstock repo is created. Thanks for your understanding.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +8,12 @@git clone https://github.com/twosigma/beakerx.git
cd beakerx/
git checkout 585f07c5dfe7f9f0f97053d90ffc5a696d972382
./gradlew -p kernel/base publishToMavenLocal
cd $RECIPE_DIR/ && rm -fr beakerx
